summary.title: introduction
summary.text: I am Egor, an experienced software engineer with a passion for entrepreneurship and self-learning. I thrive on engineering challenges and am always eager to explore new ideas and technologies. Beyond my professional pursuits, I enjoy dedicating time to personal development through foreign language studies, doing sports, and keeping up with the latest advances in technology. With a positive and easy-going personality, I approach every opportunity with optimism and enthusiasm. I am interested in remote work opportunities, if you have any please contact me on LinkedIn.

summary.title: purpose of the website
summary.text: This website was designed and developed by Egor Sorokin to collect all his projects in one place.
